[![Docker Image CI](https://github.com/KuhlTime/telegram-gravatar-bot/actions/workflows/docker-image.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/KuhlTime/telegram-gravatar-bot/actions/workflows/docker-image.yml)

This is a telegram bot that sends back gravatar profile pictures for the provided email address.
